text: Kelli is amazing and talented. She is so friendly, respectful, and professional! She ensures that you are comfortable and asks what she can do to help and doesnâ€™t just assume anything like other places. I HIGHLY recommend Kelli at Skyward Therapies LLC to any and all needing a massage or nutritional counseling!
Kelli is absolutely amazing! Hands down best masseuse I have ever had! She really knows how to target the points in your back that you are in pain from. I will never use anyone else!

Everything was wonderful! I am so glad my finally gave in and got my first professional massage from Kelli! She has great attention to detail and you can tell she really cares about her clients! I feel so refreshed and can't wait for my next visit :)

Really enjoy having Kelli work on me.  She listens to what kind of massage I'd like that day, asks if the pressure is good (and it is - not too light, not too hard) and would adjust if necessary.  And she's just a lovely person.  I feel great after one of Kelli's massages!

Kelli is amazing at what she does. She really seeks out her clients wants, needs and ultimate goal for health and healing. She makes it a comfortable, relaxing environment! Wont go anywhere else! She has magical hands and the only person I'd go to for my deep tissue massages !
Kelli is amazing! Whether you want to relax or have problem areas she will cater to your every need. Prices are affordable so give her a try. You will be happy you did and wished you called sooner!
